name: DNA: Episode 3
description:
Return to the World of the DNA Universe...




DNA Episode 3 is a continuation of DNA Episode 2 in the form of a 2D Story-driven Anime, Hack & Slash Beat'em-up where you play as the main character Leo, as he has been ordered by Chairman Sujo to travel to the Dune Kingdom and do his bidding with no second thoughts...this time.

Welcome to the Mighty Dune Kingdom...


  • Enter a desert oasis kingdom where danger lurks around every corner!

  • Uncover what lies in store for Leo as you progress through the wild dangers of the Dune Kingdom...

  • Discover dangerous new foes, from scorpions to protectors of the kingdom itself!


Hone your Skills with addicting 2D Combat Gameplay...


  • Welcome back to DNA's epic 2D Beat'em up gameplay with new abilities to acquire!

  • Continue playing a challenging gameplay formula building upon previous Episodes' rewarding difficulties.

  • Face rigorous new enemies as your traverse through the Dune Kingdom!


Continue an Epic Storyline...


  • Watch as the story develops further into intriguing events in Episode 3 of DNA.

  • Progress through the Dune Kingdom as you come to realize the truth behind Nova Corp's motives...

  • Flow through the episode with even more action-packed gameplay, and intriguing cinematics.
